submission:
from sortedcontainers import SortedList
class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        curr = n-1
        res = []
        d = defaultdict(int)
        s = SortedList()
        for a,b in queries:
            ind = s.bisect_right(a)-1
            # print(f'{ind = } {a = }')
            if ind == -1 or a >= d[s[ind]]:
                ind += 1
                while ind < len(s) and s[ind] < b:
                    curr += d[s[ind]] - s[ind] - 1
                    del d[s[ind]]
                    s.pop(ind)
                s.add(a)
                d[a] = b
                curr -= b-a-1
            elif a == s[ind] and b > d[s[ind]]:
                while ind < len(s) and s[ind] < b:
                    curr += d[s[ind]] - s[ind] - 1
                    del d[s[ind]]
                    s.pop(ind)
                s.add(a)
                d[a] = b
                curr -= b-a-1
            res.append(curr)
        return res
